verses.translation_en: The Inevitable Reality -
verses.translation_zh: 真灾，

verses.translation_en: What is the Inevitable Reality?
verses.translation_zh: 真灾是什么？

verses.translation_en: And what can make you know what is the Inevitable Reality?
verses.translation_zh: 你怎么能认识真灾是什么呢？

verses.translation_en: Thamud and 'Aad denied the Striking Calamity.
verses.translation_zh: 赛莫德人和阿德人，曾否认大难。

verses.translation_en: So as for Thamud, they were destroyed by the overpowering [blast].
verses.translation_zh: 至於赛莫德人呢，已为严刑所毁灭；

verses.text: وَأَمَّا عَادٌ فَأُهْلِكُوا۟ بِرِيحٍ صَرْصَرٍ عَاتِيَةٍ
verses.translation_en: And as for 'Aad, they were destroyed by a screaming, violent wind
verses.translation_zh: 至於阿德人，已为怒吼的暴风所毁灭。

verses.text: سَخَّرَهَا عَلَيْهِمْ سَبْعَ لَيَالٍ وَثَمَٰنِيَةَ أَيَّامٍ حُسُومًا فَتَرَى ٱلْقَوْمَ فِيهَا صَرْعَىٰ كَأَنَّهُمْ أَعْجَازُ نَخْلٍ خَاوِيَةٍ
verses.translation_en: Which Allah imposed upon them for seven nights and eight days in succession, so you would see the people therein fallen as if they were hollow trunks of palm trees.
verses.translation_zh: 真主曾使暴风对著他们连刮了七夜8昼，你看阿德人倒仆在地上，好像空心的海枣树干一样。

verses.translation_en: Then do you see of them any remains?
verses.translation_zh: 你能看见他们还有孑遗吗？

verses.text: وَجَآءَ فِرْعَوْنُ وَمَن قَبْلَهُۥ وَٱلْمُؤْتَفِكَٰتُ بِٱلْخَاطِئَةِ
verses.translation_en: And there came Pharaoh and those before him and the overturned cities with sin.
verses.translation_zh: 法老和在他之前的人，以及被倾覆的城市的居民，又再犯罪，

verses.text: فَعَصَوْا۟ رَسُولَ رَبِّهِمْ فَأَخَذَهُمْ أَخْذَةً رَّابِيَةً
verses.translation_en: And they disobeyed the messenger of their Lord, so He seized them with a seizure exceeding [in severity].
verses.translation_zh: 他们曾违抗他们的主的使者，故他严厉惩治了他们。

verses.text: إِنَّا لَمَّا طَغَا ٱلْمَآءُ حَمَلْنَٰكُمْ فِى ٱلْجَارِيَةِ
verses.translation_en: Indeed, when the water overflowed, We carried your ancestors in the sailing ship
verses.translation_zh: 当大水泛滥的时候，我让你们乘船，

verses.text: لِنَجْعَلَهَا لَكُمْ تَذْكِرَةً وَتَعِيَهَآ أُذُنٌ وَٰعِيَةٌ
verses.translation_en: That We might make it for you a reminder and [that] a conscious ear would be conscious of it.
verses.translation_zh: 以便我以那件事为你们的教训，以便能记忆的耳朵把它记住。

verses.text: فَإِذَا نُفِخَ فِى ٱلصُّورِ نَفْخَةٌ وَٰحِدَةٌ
verses.translation_en: Then when the Horn is blown with one blast
verses.translation_zh: 当号角一向，

verses.text: وَحُمِلَتِ ٱلْأَرْضُ وَٱلْجِبَالُ فَدُكَّتَا دَكَّةً وَٰحِدَةً
verses.translation_en: And the earth and the mountains are lifted and leveled with one blow -
verses.translation_zh: 大地和山岳都被移动，且互相碰撞一次的时候；

verses.translation_en: Then on that Day, the Resurrection will occur,
verses.translation_zh: 在那日，那件大事将发生，

verses.translation_en: And the heaven will split [open], for that Day it is infirm.
verses.translation_zh: 天将破裂；在那日，天将成为脆弱的。

verses.text: وَٱلْمَلَكُ عَلَىٰٓ أَرْجَآئِهَا وَيَحْمِلُ عَرْشَ رَبِّكَ فَوْقَهُمْ يَوْمَئِذٍ ثَمَٰنِيَةٌ
verses.translation_en: And the angels are at its edges. And there will bear the Throne of your Lord above them, that Day, eight [of them].
verses.translation_zh: 众天神将在天的各方；在那日，在他们上面，将有八个天神，担负你的主的宝座；

verses.text: يَوْمَئِذٍ تُعْرَضُونَ لَا تَخْفَىٰ مِنكُمْ خَافِيَةٌ
verses.translation_en: That Day, you will be exhibited [for judgement]; not hidden among you is anything concealed.
verses.translation_zh: 在那日，你们将被检阅，你们的任何秘密，都无法隐藏。

verses.text: فَأَمَّا مَنْ أُوتِىَ كِتَٰبَهُۥ بِيَمِينِهِۦ فَيَقُولُ هَآؤُمُ ٱقْرَءُوا۟ كِتَٰبِيَهْ
verses.translation_en: So as for he who is given his record in his right hand, he will say, "Here, read my record!
verses.translation_zh: 用右手接受自己的功过簿的人将说：你们拿我的功过簿去读读吧！

verses.translation_en: Indeed, I was certain that I would be meeting my account."
verses.translation_zh: 我确已猜想到我必遇见我的账目。

verses.translation_en: So he will be in a pleasant life -
verses.translation_zh: 他将在愉快的生活里，

verses.translation_en: In an elevated garden,
verses.translation_zh: 在崇高的乐园里，

verses.translation_en: Its [fruit] to be picked hanging near.
verses.translation_zh: 那里面的水果伸手可得。

verses.text: كُلُوا۟ وَٱشْرَبُوا۟ هَنِيٓـًٔۢا بِمَآ أَسْلَفْتُمْ فِى ٱلْأَيَّامِ ٱلْخَالِيَةِ
verses.translation_en: [They will be told], "Eat and drink in satisfaction for what you put forth in the days past."
verses.translation_zh: 你们可以愉快地饮食，因为你们在过去的岁月中行过善。

verses.text: وَأَمَّا مَنْ أُوتِىَ كِتَٰبَهُۥ بِشِمَالِهِۦ فَيَقُولُ يَٰلَيْتَنِى لَمْ أُوتَ كِتَٰبِيَهْ
verses.translation_en: But as for he who is given his record in his left hand, he will say, "Oh, I wish I had not been given my record
verses.translation_zh: 以左手接过自己的功过簿的人将说：啊呀！但愿我没有接过我的功过簿，

verses.translation_en: And had not known what is my account.
verses.translation_zh: 不知道我自己的账目！

verses.translation_en: I wish my death had been the decisive one.
verses.translation_zh: 但愿尘世的死亡已了结我的一生！

verses.translation_en: My wealth has not availed me.
verses.translation_zh: 我的财产於我毫无裨益，

verses.translation_en: Gone from me is my authority."
verses.translation_zh: 我的权柄已从我的手中消失。

verses.translation_en: [Allah will say], "Seize him and shackle him.
verses.translation_zh: 你们捉住他，给他带上枷锁，

verses.translation_en: Then into Hellfire drive him.
verses.translation_zh: 然后把他投在烈火里，

verses.text: ثُمَّ فِى سِلْسِلَةٍ ذَرْعُهَا سَبْعُونَ ذِرَاعًا فَٱسْلُكُوهُ
verses.translation_en: Then into a chain whose length is seventy cubits insert him."
verses.translation_zh: 然后把他穿在一条7十臂长的链子上。

verses.text: إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ لَا يُؤْمِنُ بِٱللَّهِ ٱلْعَظِيمِ
verses.translation_en: Indeed, he did not used to believe in Allah, the Most Great,
verses.translation_zh: 他生前确是不信仰尊大的真主，

verses.translation_en: Nor did he encourage the feeding of the poor.
verses.translation_zh: 不勉励人账济贪民；

verses.translation_en: So there is not for him here this Day any devoted friend
verses.translation_zh: 故今日他在这里没有一个亲戚。

verses.translation_en: Nor any food except from the discharge of wounds;
verses.translation_zh: 除脓汁外，他没有食物。

verses.translation_en: None will eat it except the sinners.
verses.translation_zh: 只有迷误的人们才吃脓汁。

verses.translation_en: So I swear by what you see
verses.translation_zh: 不然！我以你们所能见的万象盟誓，

verses.translation_en: And what you do not see
verses.translation_zh: 并且以你们不能见的幽玄盟誓，

verses.translation_en: [That] indeed, the Qur'an is the word of a noble Messenger.
verses.translation_zh: 这确是尊贵的使者的言辞；

verses.text: وَمَا هُوَ بِقَوْلِ شَاعِرٍ قَلِيلًا مَّا تُؤْمِنُونَ
verses.translation_en: And it is not the word of a poet; little do you believe.
verses.translation_zh: 并不是诗人的言辞，你们很少信仰，

verses.text: وَلَا بِقَوْلِ كَاهِنٍ قَلِيلًا مَّا تَذَكَّرُونَ
verses.translation_en: Nor the word of a soothsayer; little do you remember.
verses.translation_zh: 也不是仆人的言辞，你们很少觉悟。

verses.translation_en: [It is] a revelation from the Lord of the worlds.
verses.translation_zh: 这是从全世界的主降示的。

verses.translation_en: And if Muhammad had made up about Us some [false] sayings,
verses.translation_zh: 假若他假借我的名义，捏造谣言，

verses.translation_en: We would have seized him by the right hand;
verses.translation_zh: 我必以权力逮捕他，

verses.translation_en: Then We would have cut from him the aorta.
verses.translation_zh: 然后必割断他的大动脉，

verses.text: فَمَا مِنكُم مِّنْ أَحَدٍ عَنْهُ حَٰجِزِينَ
verses.translation_en: And there is no one of you who could prevent [Us] from him.
verses.translation_zh: 你们中没有一个人能保卫他。

verses.translation_en: And indeed, the Qur'an is a reminder for the righteous.
verses.translation_zh: 这确是对敬畏者的教训。

verses.translation_en: And indeed, We know that among you are deniers.
verses.translation_zh: 我的确知道你们中有否认的人。

verses.translation_en: And indeed, it will be [a cause of] regret upon the disbelievers.
verses.translation_zh: 这对於不信道的人们确是悔恨。

verses.translation_en: And indeed, it is the truth of certainty.
verses.translation_zh: 这确是真实的信念，

verses.translation_en: So exalt the name of your Lord, the Most Great.
verses.translation_zh: 故你当颂扬你的主的大名。
